member.summary: The font color of the cell.Many standard CSS formats are supported, but the canonical form is "#ccff00".

member.summary: The font family for the cell.

member.summary: The font size of the cell in pixels.

member.summary: Sets the cell font to italic, if set to true.

member.summary: Disables the cell, if set to false.

member.summary: The format of the cell text.See Create or delete a custom number format on MS Office.

member.summary: The cell formula without the leading equals sign, e.g. A1 * 10.

member.summary: The hyperlink (URL) of the cell.

member.name: T:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Criteria
member.summary: Represents a Criteria
Represents a Criteria

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Criteria.Operator
member.summary: The criterion operator type.Supported types vary based on the inferred column data type (inferred): * Text * contains - the text contains the value * doesnotcontain - text does not contain the value * startswith - text starts with the value * endswith - text ends with the value * Date * eq - date is the same as the value * neq - date is not the same as the value * lt - date is before the value * gt - date is after the value * Number * eq - is equal to the value * neq - is not equal to the value * gte - is greater than or equal to the value * gt - is greater than the value * lte - is less than or equal to the value * lt - is less than the value

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Criteria.Value
member.summary: The value for the criteria operator.

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Criteria.SerializeSettings
member.summary: Serialize current instance to Dictionary

Represents a Filter

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Filter.Columns
member.summary: An array defining the filter configuration of individual columns.

member.summary: The active range for the filter, e.g. "B1:D8".

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Filter.SerializeSettings
member.summary: Serialize current instance to Dictionary

Represents a FilterColumn

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.Dates
member.summary: An array of dates to filter.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.Criteria
member.summary: An array of filter criteria for custom filters.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.Filter
member.summary: The filter to apply to this column.The supported filters are: * value - filters based on unique values * custom - applies custom filtering criteria * top - filters the top or bottom records * dynamic - filters based on dynamic criteria

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.Index
member.summary: The index of the column relative to the filter range.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.Logic
member.summary: The logical operator to apply to filter criteria.Possible values are and, or.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.Type
member.summary: The filter sub-type, if any.Applicable types according to the main filter. * top * topNumber * topPercent * bottomNumber * bottomPercent * dynamic * aboveAverage * belowAverage * tomorrow * today * yesterday * nextWeek * thisWeek * lastWeek * nextMonth * thisMonth * lastMonth * nextQuarter * thisQuarter * lastQuarter * nextYear * thisYear * lastYear * yearToDate

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.Value
member.summary: The filter value for filters that require a single value, e.g. "top".

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.Blanks
member.summary: Indicates whether to include blank values

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.FilterColumn.SerializeSettings
member.summary: Serialize current instance to Dictionary

member.summary: Represents a Pdf
Represents a Pdf

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Area
member.summary: The area to export. Possible values:

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Author
member.summary: The author of the PDF document.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Creator
member.summary: The creator of the PDF document.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Date
member.summary: The date when the PDF document is created. Defaults to new Date().

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.FileName
member.summary: Specifies the file name of the exported PDF file.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.FitWidth
member.summary: An option indicating whether to fit the spreadsheet content to page width.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.ForceProxy
member.summary: If set to true, the content will be forwarded to proxyURL even if the browser supports saving files locally.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Guidelines
member.summary: An option indicating whether to export the cell guidelines.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.HCenter
member.summary: An option indicating whether to center the content horizontally.See also vCenter.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Keywords
member.summary: Specifies the keywords of the exported PDF file.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Landscape
member.summary: Set to true to reverse the paper dimensions if needed such that width is the larger edge.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Margin
member.summary: Specifies the margins of the page (numbers or strings with units). Supported units are "mm", "cm", "in" and "pt" (default).

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.PaperSize
member.summary: Specifies the paper size of the PDF document. The default "auto" means paper size is determined by content.Supported values:

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.ProxyURL
member.summary: The URL of the server side proxy which will stream the file to the end user.A proxy will be used when the browser isn't capable of saving files locally e.g. Internet Explorer 9 and Safari. PDF export is not supported in Internet Explorer 8 and below.The developer is responsible for implementing the server-side proxy.The proxy will receive a POST request with the following parameters in the request body:The proxy should return the decoded file with the "Content-Disposition" header set to attachment; filename="<fileName.pdf>".

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.ProxyTarget
member.summary: A name or keyword indicating where to display the document returned from the proxy.If you want to display the document in a new window or iframe, the proxy should set the "Content-Disposition" header to inline; filename="<fileName.pdf>".

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Subject
member.summary: Sets the subject of the PDF file.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.Title
member.summary: Sets the title of the PDF file.

member.name: P:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.VCenter
member.summary: An option indicating whether to center the content vertically.See also hCenter.

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Pdf.SerializeSettings
member.summary: Serialize current instance to Dictionary

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Workbook.Load(System.String)
member.summary:
Creates a Workbook instance and populates it with data from the specified file.
Supported file formats are XLSX, CSV, TXT (Tab-separated) and JSON.
member.param: The fully-qualified path to the file

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Workbook.Load(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Workbook instance and populates it with data from the provided stream. The stream will be closed after completion.
member.param: The file extension. Supported extensions are ".xlsx", ".csv", ".txt" and ".json"

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Workbook.Save(System.String)
member.summary:
Stores the data from the Workbook in the specified file.
Supported file formats are XLSX, CSV, TXT (Tab-separated) and JSON.
member.param: The fully-qualified path to the output file

member.name: M:Telerik.Web.Spreadsheet.Workbook.Save(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the data from the Workbook in the provided stream. The stream will be closed after completion.
member.param: The file extension. Supported extensions are ".xlsx", ".csv", ".txt" and ".json"
